overview.en: imChat is a comprehensive mobile communication tool that helps users easily connect with friends, provide peer-to-peer chat and group chat, and support sending text, emoticons, voices, pictures, files, links and other messages, as well as rich group management functions; imChat provides content creation and distribution based on the public number, and recommends information to the user in the form of a headline; imChat supports digital currency wallet to help users manage various digital currencies such as BTC, ETH, etc., and supports transfers and red packets;
overview.zh: imChat 是一款全方位的手机通讯工具，帮助用户轻松连接朋友，提供点对点聊天和群聊，支持发送文字、表情、语音、图片、文件、链接等消息，以及丰富的群管理功能；imChat 基于公号提供内容的创建和发布，以头条的方式向用户推荐资讯；imChat 支持数字货币零钱包，帮助用户管理各种数字货币如BTC、ETH等，并支持转账和红包；
